GPO.Name: Security - Audit (extended log)
GPO.Description: Harden AD 2.1 - Enforce audit logging and extended audit logging.

GPO.Name: Security - Auto Update - Up to Win 8
GPO.Description: Harden AD 2.1 - Setup Wsus Client for client up to Windows 8.1

GpoFilter.WMI: OS is less or equal to Windows 8.1

GPO.Name: Security - Auto Update - Win 10
GPO.Description: Harden AD 2.1 - Setup Wsus Client for client equal to Windows 10 and above

GpoFilter.WMI: OS is greater or equal to Windows 10

GPO.Name: Security - Auto Update - Up to Win Srv 2012 R2
GPO.Description: Harden AD 2.1 - Setup Wsus Client for server up to Windows server 2012 r2

GpoFilter.WMI: OS is less or equal to Windows Server 2012 R2

GPO.Name: Security - Auto Update - Win Srv 2016
GPO.Description: Harden AD 2.1 - Setup Wsus Client for server equal to Windows server 2016 and above

GpoFilter.WMI: OS is greater or equal to Windows Server 2016

GPO.Name: Security - BitLocker - TPM + PIN
GPO.Description: Harden AD 2.1 - Enable Bitlocker cyphering with TPM using a 6 characters passcode

GPO.Name: Security - BitLocker - TPM only
GPO.Description: Harden AD 2.1 - Enable Bitlocker cyphering with TPM but without passcode

GPO.Name: Security - BloodHound - Block NetCease
GPO.Description: Harden AD 2.1 - Block net session enumration to mask identities using share on a domain (primary target localization with bloodhound)

GPO.Name: Security - DC - Disable weak SSL protocols
GPO.Description: Harden AD 2.1 - Disable SSLv2 and SSLv3 on windows systems

GPO.Name: Security - Disable LLMNR
GPO.Description: Harden AD 2.1 - Disable Link-local Multicast Name Resolution on older systems

GPO.Name: Security - Disable NTLM V1 et LM
GPO.Description: Harden AD 2.1 - Enforce NTLMv2

GPO.Name: Security - Disable Server Print Spooler Service
GPO.Description: Harden AD 2.1 - Enforce the Print Spooler service in a disabled state on all Server Systems

GPO.Name: Security - Disable PrintNightmare
GPO.Description: Harden AD 2.1 - Temporary rules to allow users to print once the Septembre Update has been applied

GPO.Name: Security - Disable Smbv1
GPO.Description: Harden AD 2.1 - Enforce SMBv2 has minimum version

GPO.Name: Security - GPO Refresh Cycle - 20 minutes
GPO.Description: Harden AD 2.1 - Enforce GPO cycle to 20 minutes instead of the default vaule (45 minutes)

GPO.Name: Security - IPv4 - Priority
GPO.Description: Harden AD 2.1 - Enforce IPv4 priority over IPv6

GPO.Name: Security - PowerShell - Logs
GPO.Description: Harden AD 2.1 - Enforce logging for all PowerShell commands

GPO.Name: Security - Restriction - Login - Tier 0
GPO.Description: Harden AD 2.1 - Deny Login to Super Admins on Tier 1 and Tier 2 Systems

GPO.Name: Security - Deny Networking to Internet
GPO.Description: Harden AD 2.1 - Set system Firewall to deny any traffic to non-local network

GPO.Name: Security - Enforce Login Tier 0
GPO.Description: Harden AD 2.1 - Restrict login to only Super Admins on Tier 0 systems

GPO.Name: Security - Firewall - Audit Only
GPO.Description: Harden AD 2.1 - Setup Microsoft Firewall in audit mode (allow all, log everything)

GPO.Name: Security - Firewall - Enabled (Allow Local Rules)
GPO.Description: Harden AD 2.1 - Setup Microsoft Firewall in active mode in addition to system local rules

GPO.Name: Security - Local Administrator Password Solution (x64)
GPO.Description: Harden AD 2.1 - Deploy and Setup LAPS on x64 systems

GPO.Name: Security - Local Administrator Password Solution (x86)
GPO.Description: Harden AD 2.1 - Deploy and Setup LAPS on x86 systems

GPO.Name: Security - Local Administrators - servers
GPO.Description: Harden AD 2.1 -Deploy an specific group as local admin on each system (dynamic group name)

GPO.Name: Security - Local Administrators - Stations
GPO.Description: Harden AD 2.1 -Deploy an specific group as local admin on each system (dynamic group name)

GPO.Name: Security - Screenlock
GPO.Description: Harden AD 2.1 - Enforce ScreenLock (20 minutes)

GPO.Name: Security – UAC
GPO.Description: Harden AD 2.1 - Enforce User Account Control on system (except for Members of G_Security-Disable-UAC)

Group.name: G-S-T0_Managers
Group.Description: Members of this group can see and manage all the Active Directory objects

Group.name: L-S-T0_LocalAdmins_Servers
Group.Description: Members of this group will become member of the builtin\administrators group

Group.name: G-S-T1_Managers
Group.Description: Members of this group can manage all Tier 1 ressources, including T1 admin users and groups

Group.name: G-S-T1_Administrators
Group.Description: Members of this group can manage all Tier 1 ressources, excluding T1 admin users and groups

Group.name: G-S-T1_Operators
Group.Description: Members of this group can operate on Tier 1 resources (login)

Group.name: L-S-T1-DELEG_Group - Manage Membership
Group.Description: Members of this group can add and remove members of tier 1 groups within productions OUs

Group.name: L-S-T1-DELEG_Group - Create and Delete
Group.Description: Members of this group can create, update and delete groups within productions OUs (Tier 1 and 2)

Group.name: L-S-T1-DELEG_Group - Create and Delete (administration)
Group.Description: Members of this group can create, update and delete groups within Tier 1 Administration OU

Group.name: L-S-T1-DELEG_User - Create and Delete
Group.Description: Members of this group can create, update and delete users within productions OUs (Tier 1 and 2)

Group.name: L-S-T1-DELEG_User - Create and Delete (administration)
Group.Description: Members of this group can create, update and delete users within Tier 1 administration OU

Group.name: L-S-T1-DELEG_Computer - Create and Delete
Group.Description: Members of this group can create, update and delete commputers within productions OUs (Tier 1 and 2)

Group.name: L-S-T1-DELEG_Contact - Create and Delete
Group.Description: Members of this group can create, update and delete contact within productions OUs (Tier 1 and 2)

Group.name: L-S-T1_LocalAdmins_Servers
Group.Description: Members of this group will become member of the builtin\administrators group

Group.name: G-S-T2_Managers
Group.Description: Members of this group can manage all Tier 2 ressources, including T1 admin users and groups

Group.name: G-S-T2_Administrators
Group.Description: Members of this group can manage all Tier 2 ressources, excluding T1 admin users and groups

Group.name: G-S-T2_Operators
Group.Description: Members of this group can operate on Tier 2 resources (login)

Group.name: L-S-T2-DELEG_Group - Manage Membership
Group.Description: Members of this group can add and remove members of tier 1 groups within productions OUs

Group.name: L-S-T2-DELEG_Group - Create and Delete
Group.Description: Members of this group can create, update and delete groups within productions OUs (Tier 1 and 2)

Group.name: L-S-T2-DELEG_Group - Create and Delete (administration)
Group.Description: Members of this group can create, update and delete groups within Tier 1 Administration OU

Group.name: L-S-T2-DELEG_User - Create and Delete
Group.Description: Members of this group can create, update and delete users within productions OUs (Tier 1 and 2)

Group.name: L-S-T2-DELEG_User - Create and Delete (administration)
Group.Description: Members of this group can create, update and delete users within Tier 1 administration OU

Group.name: L-S-T2-DELEG_Computer - Create and Delete
Group.Description: Members of this group can create, update and delete commputers within productions OUs (Tier 1 and 2)

Group.name: L-S-T2-DELEG_Contact - Create and Delete
Group.Description: Members of this group can create, update and delete contact within productions OUs (Tier 1 and 2)

Group.name: L-S-T2_LocalAdmins_Workstations
Group.Description: Members of this group will become member of the builtin\administrators group

Group.name: G-S-TL_Operators
Group.Description: Members of this group can operate on Tier Legacy resources (login)

Group.name: L-S-TL_LocalAdmins_Servers
Group.Description: Members of this group will become member of the builtin\administrators group

Group.name: L-S-TL_LocalAdmins_Workstations
Group.Description: Members of this group will become member of the builtin\administrators group

SchedTask.Name: MCS - Sensitive Groups Flushing
SchedTask.SchedDsc: Flush highly sensitive groups (see MCS-GroupsScheduling.csv for details)

Id.Name: Restrict computer junction to the domain
Id.TaskDescription: set `(msDSMachineAccountQuota` to `(0` to restrict domain junction

Id.Name: Activate Active Directory Recycle Bin
Id.TaskDescription: activate the `(AD Recycle Bin` optional feature

Id.Name: Set Notify on every Site Links
Id.TaskDescription: set `(notify` on every `(Site Links

Id.Name: Set GPO Central Store
Id.TaskDescription: set `(GPO Central Store` and update `{adm` and `{admx` files

Id.Name: Set Administration Organizational Unit
Id.TaskDescription: set `(Administration` organizational unit

Id.Name: Set Tier 0 Organizational Unit
Id.TaskDescription: set `(Tier 0` organizational unit

Id.Name: Set Tier 1 and Tier 2 Organizational Unit
Id.TaskDescription: set `(Tier 1 and Tier 2 combo` organizational unit

Id.Name: Set Legacy Organizational Unit
Id.TaskDescription: set `(Tier Legacy` organizational unit

Id.Name: Set Provisionning Organizational Unit
Id.TaskDescription: set `(Provisionning` organizational unit

Id.Name: Default user location on creation
Id.TaskDescription: set `(user objects` default location

Id.Name: Default computer location on creation
Id.TaskDescription: set `(computer objects` default location

Id.Name: Create administration accounts
Id.TaskDescription: create `(administration accounts` used by the tier model

Id.Name: Create administration groups
Id.TaskDescription: create `(administration groups` used by the tier model

Id.Name: Enforce delegation model through ACEs
Id.TaskDescription: Enforce `(Delegation ACEs` used by the tier model

Id.Name: Create Microsoft 365 syncing Organizational Units
Id.TaskDescription: create `(synchronization OUs` used by `[Azure AD Connect`

Id.Name: Create Microsoft 365 syncing Organizational Units
Id.TaskDescription: create `(synchronization OUs` used by `[Azure AD Connect`

Id.Name: Generate migration table for group policies
Id.TaskDescription: Generate `(migration table` used by import function when adding a `[group policy`

Id.Name: Generate translation table for group policies preferences
Id.TaskDescription: Update `(group policy xml preference files` with `[new SID values` according to the preferences migration table

Id.Name: Import additional WMI Filters
Id.TaskDescription: Import `(WMI filter` to the domain

Id.Name: Import new GPO or update existing ones
Id.TaskDescription: Import or update `(group policy objects` to the domain and link them

Id.Name: Update Ad schema for LAPS and deploy PShell tools
Id.TaskDescription: Update `(AD Schema` for `[LAPS` and add `(PShell add-on`

Id.Name: Setup LAPS permissions over the domain
Id.TaskDescription: Set-up `(LAPS` permissions on the target domain

Id.Name: Update LAPS deployment scripts
Id.TaskDescription: Update `(LAPS Scripts` to match with the domain name

Id.Name: Import schedule tasks on the running system
Id.TaskDescription: Import new `(schedule tasks` to the `[running system`

Id.Name: Reset Group Memberships
Id.TaskDescription: Reset `(groups's membeberships` to the `[trusted list`

Id.Name: Download PingCastle - Audit
Id.TaskDescription: Download the latest `(PingCastle` release from `(Github` and run an Audit with parameter `[--healthcheck --no-enum-limit --level Full`
